name: GDPR Compliance Policy - Sample Implementation
description: Sample GDPR compliance policy demonstrating data protection requirements

requirements.title: Data Subject Rights Implementation
requirements.description: Ensure all data subject rights (access, rectification, erasure, etc.) are properly implemented
controls: Article 18: Right to restriction of processing
Article 22: Right to object to automated decision making
remediation_steps: Implement API endpoints for data subject requests
Create automated processes for data retrieval and deletion
Establish request tracking and response systems
Train staff on data subject rights procedures

requirements.title: Data Protection Officer Appointment
requirements.description: Appoint a qualified Data Protection Officer and ensure proper oversight
controls: Article 37: Designation of the data protection officer
Article 38: Position of the data protection officer
Article 39: Tasks of the data protection officer
remediation_steps: Appoint qualified DPO with necessary expertise
Provide DPO with necessary resources and independence
Ensure DPO has access to all necessary information

requirements.title: Privacy by Design Implementation
requirements.description: Implement privacy by design principles in all data processing activities
controls: Article 25: Data protection by design and by default
remediation_steps: Conduct privacy impact assessments for new projects
Implement privacy controls in system design
